Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (G) on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,888,000 per year...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1985, off Mark Clear (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1986, hitting .474 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Seattle on 5/23/1986...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Seattle on 5/23/1986...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/1986, hitting .545 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
